game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the dungeon.
game.description: In search of a legendary artifact, you must navigate through treacherous dungeons filled with monsters and puzzles. Retrieve the artifact and return it to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magical ring

task.objective: Enter the dungeon and locate the entrance to the treasure room.
task.description: A hidden door in the southeast corner of the first level leads to the treasure room where the artifact is kept.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian monster guarding the artifact.
task.description: A powerful undead sorcerer protects the treasure room. You must defeat him to claim the artifact.
